QuestData.Title: Meet with Signilda Hardforge
QuestData.Description: Signilda Hardforge sent a message for you. She wants you to join her at her at the Training Hall in Stormwind's Old Town as quickly as you can. It sounded important, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Signilda Hardforge at the Training Hall in Stormwind.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Signilda Hardforge at the Training Hall in Stormwind.
